say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hello('Luke')

'Hello Luke!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello('Luke')=='Hello Luke!'

Prodb API

Create pandas dataframe for manipulation

{% raw %}

generate_db[source]

generate_db(prefill=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
generate_db(prefill=True)
df = pd.read_csv('db.csv')
df.head()
name location score time_utc
0 Sam UK 0 16:33:26
1 Grant NZ 30 16:33:26
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

insert_row[source]

insert_row(df, data, db_path='db.csv')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = pd.read_csv('db.csv')
display(df.head())

data = {'name':'Geo', 'location': 'JP', 'score':5}
df = insert_row(df, data)
display(df)
name location score time_utc
0 Sam UK 0 16:33:26
1 Grant NZ 30 16:33:26
name location score time_utc
0 Sam UK 0 16:33:26
1 Grant NZ 30 16:33:26
2 Geo JP 5 16:33:27
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
data = {'name':'Bill', 'location': 'JP', 'score':None}
df = insert_row(df, data)
display(df)
name location score time_utc
0 Sam UK 0 13:54:38
1 Grant NZ 30 13:54:38
2 Geo JP 5 13:57:32
3 Bill JP None 13:57:36
{% endraw %}
